translations: abbr.报纸，杂志；日记；轴颈（journal）；（旧）出师的学徒工；熟练工（journeyman）

phrs.translation: 当天供应的，今日特色的

sentences.sentence: The high cost of food is the topic du jour.
sentences.translation: 食物的高成本是当今的主题。

sentences.sentence: But the French were not the first to think of the ten-hour day, nor even the centi-jour.
sentences.translation: 但是并不是法国人第一个想到十小时日的，百分日甚至也不是第一个。

sentences.sentence: Even so, the idea of a centi-jour (14.4 minutes) has cropped up on several occasions since.
sentences.translation: 尽管如此，从那时起，百分日(每一等分14.4分钟)的概念却已见诸于有些场合。
